item.description:
This meetup is another alternative for getting together. The plan is to have a definite meeting each month on the first Thursday. Wanting to give others who can't do weeknights a daytime alternative, and we'll see how that goes.

From our discussion at the last daytime Meetup, I believe Thursday daytime was a good day for those who attended and had interest in coming back again. I will change the day if my memory of which day was best is not accurate, so please email me if you were there and the day we picked was not a Thursday!

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Daytime Meetup
